description: During this tenure, I organized many interactive sessions between students at our college and some industry experts in different domains. By doing this I have learned about collaboration, teamwork, communication skills etc.

During this one-month internship, I have gained immense knowledge about the real-world application of Electrical Engineering and some engineering challenges and their solutions. I have also visited most of the power plant divisions' and gained some invaluable knowledge.
Intern, involved in the development of a chatbot. I also created videos and wrote some blogs on machine learning during this period.
